attributes.additional_details:
Global human population has reached 7 billion: the only way forward is to adopt renewable energy.
Now is the time to act to stop the monopoly on energy prices and prevent further damage to the environment caused by the use of fossil fuel, nuclear power and other non-renewable energies.
We have access to an immensely powerful thermonuclear energy source: putting money into solar research will pay off with cheap, clean and abundant energy which is what the planet needs at the time when people are beginning to need it the most.
Remember coal, oil and gas will all run out between 50 and 100 years time, act NOW to save the planet and your children’s future.
